Text: Theophilus Hastings, 9th Earl of Huntingdon:  He fathered seven legitimate children including Francis Hastings, 10th Earl of Huntingdon (13 March 1729 – 2 October 1789) and Elizabeth Rawdon, Countess of Moira (1731–1808).
